What I Do

My name is Sam Soffes. I create amazing iPhone, Mac, and web software (or anything you could ever imagine) at Tasteful Works.

What I've Done

I founded Trimonix a few years ago and released a Mac app (and a fun little iPhone app). I used to write iPhone apps and large scale web applications at LifeChurch.tv.

Contact Me

The best way to get in touch with me is email, but here are some alternatives. If you want me to turn your dreams into software, contact Tasteful Works and we'll get you taken care of.
